title: Typographic terminology
content:
Can somebody please tell me the correct name for the inverse p-shaped paragraph sign: **¶** and the double-s shaped one: **§**?

 [‹ Ligatures in OpenType: Discretionary vs. Standard](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212015613/http:/www.typophile.com/node/9473 "Go to previous forum topic") [Accented characters in headlines ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212015613/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12981 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Bald Condensed
